settings.heading: Materials
settings.content:
• Soft Net - Net is a textile in which yarns are fused or looped at their intersections that result in a fabric with open spaces between each yarn. Net fabric is woven in a grid like structure.
  • Soft Crepe - Aside from its characteristic wrinkled look, crepe material fabric usually has a beautiful drape. The thinness of the fabric makes it very breezy and breathable; plus, it doesn't feel heavy on the skin. Though this is great for Baby's Skin.

settings.heading: Color & Size Instructions
settings.content:
Color
Product Color May vary slightly due to Photographic Lighting Sources or Your Display Settings.

Size
Choose the perfect size by selecting the size Care fully or asking Customer Support with a "Message - I need help With size" message.

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
Shipping & Return Policy

Please carefully review our Shipping-Delivery & Return-Echange Policy when purchasing our products. This policy will apply to any order you place with Us.

Shipping and Delivery Time

We offer free shipping on all orders.

In most cases, the delivery will take 7-9 business days.

However, there are several reasons that can cause it to be delayed , You will receive tracking information in the mail as soon as your order has shipped.

Do you Deliver Internationally ?

We do not offer international shipping in this site (Working on it), However, You can still purchased these dresses Via WhatsApp - 8980180848

Return and Exchange Policy

All of our dresses are customized for every customer and it takes a lot of pain and effort to make them perfect. Additionally, once you return the product, we cannot use the product which has been made only for your baby.

We will really appreciate your consideration of this. We will be able to keep our product prices reasonable for all of our customers if we have low returns.

Exchanges or corrections are available for all products in case of sizing/fitting issues.

In addition, if you receive a damaged dress, we can exchange it for the same dress, but you must notify us within 72 hours of receiving it (you must provide video proof of opening the dress and photos showing the damage).

settings.heading: Made with Love
settings.content: Our all baby dresses are made as per order, ensuring every dress is made with care and attention to detail.
